Get Total Cases by Country

get_total_cases.Rd

Get Total Cases by Country

get_total_cases()

Value

Returns a data frame of variables along with their most recent value.

Examples



get_total_cases()
#> Warning: 'autostart' is now deprecated and ignored. Consider skip='string' or skip=n
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> # A tibble: 186 x 2
#>    country           cases
#>    <chr>             <dbl>
#>  1 Global-confirmed 142539
#>  2 China             81021
#>  3 China-Hubei       67790
#>  4 Cases-nonChina    61518
#>  5 Italy             17660
#>  6 Iran              11364
#>  7 RepublicofKorea    8086
#>  8 Spain              4231
#>  9 France             3640
#> 10 Germany            3062
#> # … with 176 more rows
